snippet: Pesky was a star Red Sox shortstop of the 1940s and early ’50s who spent seven decades at Fenway Park as a player, manager, coach, broadcaster and instructor.
abstract: Johnny Pesky, star Red Sox shortstop of the 1940s and early 1950s and a fixture at Fenway Park for seven decades, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Pesky was a star Red Sox shortstop of the 1940s and early ’50s who spent seven decades at Fenway Park as a player, manager, coach, broadcaster and instructor.

headline.seo: Johnny Pesky, Fan Favorite at Fenway Park, Dies at 92
headline.main: Johnny Pesky, Red Sox Fixture, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Johnny Pesky, Red Sox Fixture, Dies at 92
